SELECT A.CODE, B.dename, C.poname, D.s_section, A.emp_num, A.emp_name FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM EMP_MANAGE A INNER JOIN ( SELECT emp_num, MAX(writer_day) AS writer_day FROM EMP_MANAGE GROUP BY emp_num) B ON A.writer_day = B.writer_day AND A.emp_num = B.emp_num) A
LEFT JOIN DEMG B ON A.demgcode = B.CODE
LEFT JOIN POSISYS C ON A.pocode = C.CODE
LEFT JOIN LIST_MANAGE D ON A.li_code = D.code
